name: Ditch
description: Ditch is a financial wellness company that is using AI to revolutionize the way consumers manage and repay their debt. Ditch is on a mission to empower people to make choices that help them.
one_liner: Ditch is a financial wellness company that is using AI to revolutionize the way consumers manage and repay their debt. Ditch is on a mission to empower people to make choices that help them.
